'''''Icy Issues''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Kaboom! [[Hilichurls]] have ignited their Exploding Barrels... but why are they this cold? Foil their dangerous scheme, and fast!}}
#Defeat all opponents (0/10)
#* 10 enemies in two waves:
#**Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*2;Ice Shield Hilichurl Guard*2;Cryo Samachurl*1;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl*1}}
#**Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier*3;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl*1}}
